Key Match Events: Paolo Banchero scored 12 of Orlando's final 14 points as a rally fell just short.
Pre-Game Insights: Orlando was without Jalen Suggs and Gary Harris due to injuries, and Jett Howard left the game with a left ankle sprain.
Post-Match Reflections: Paolo Banchero is expected to elevate to superstar status in the Magic's remaining 41 games and playoff run.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Orlando hosts the Philadelphia 76ers on Sunday, giving Banchero a day of rest.
